          <title>
            <string language="hu">Iszlám lovasság</string>
            <string language="en">Islam cavalry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Islamkavallerie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavalerie de l'Islam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cavalaria do islam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cavalry di Islam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιππικό Ισλάμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caballería del Islam</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Iszlám lovasság bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Illustration of the Islam cavalry</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Perzsia,  arabok,  arab hódítások,  arab államok,  támadások,  ló,  lovasság,  Dél-Európa,  </string>
            <string language="en">Persian, Arabian, conquest of Arabian, States of Arabian, attacks, horse, cavalry, South-European</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung der Islamkavallerie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration de la cavalerie de l'Islam</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustração da cavalaria do islam</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione del cavalry di Islam</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση του ιππικού Ισλάμ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustración de la caballería del Islam</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Persisch, arabisch, Eroberung des Arabers, Zustände 
des Arabers, Angriffe, Pferd, Kavallerie, Süden-Europäisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Persan, Arabe, conquête de l'Arabe, états d'Arabe, 
attaques, cheval, cavalerie, sud-european</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Persa, arabian, conquest do arabian, estados do 
arabian, ataques, cavalo, cavalaria, Sul-Européia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Persiana, arabo, la conquista dell'Arabo, 
Dichiara dell'Arabo, gli attacchi, il cavallo, cavalry, 
Sud-Europeo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περσικός, αραβικά, κατάκτηση Αραβα, κράτη Αραβα, 
επιθέσεις, άλογο, ιππικό, νότος-Ευρωπαίος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Persa, árabe, conquista del árabe, estados del 
árabe, ataques, caballo, caballería, Sur-Europea</string>
